text: I had an excellent experience at this dental clinic. Dr. Luisa provided exceptional care and made me feel comfortable throughout my entire visit. Her expertise and gentle approach put me at ease. The clinic is clean, modern, and well-equipped. The staff was friendly and professional. I'm grateful for Dr. Luisa's thorough examination and clear explanations. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone looking for quality dental care!"

The service was professional - from the appointment making to the treatment. I did not have to wait at all. The dentist and nurse were efficient. The dentist is highly skilled, the treatment was speedy. The price was reasonable. For sure, I am coming back again. I recommend the same.

I had a great experience here! My attending dentist was Dr. Maurice, he and his team were non-judgemental and made sure to check on my wellbeing throughout the whole procedure. Their prices are reasonable and they are CHAS subsidised, would definitely recommend.

Excellent tooth care experience as always, never fail my expectations given Q&M name as an established and well rounded player in the industry. Where theres a need, i can always trust that they are equipped with all necessary specialised tools and equipment like X-ray, be it filling up a cracked tooth etc. I’m also pleasantly surprised that they have good electronic data management system, with my teeth records at other O&M outlets readily available, the dentist can remind me on what was previously done to the concerned tooth and make informed decisions to either remove or perform filling. Always a pleasant experience at Q&M

Dr eng yu zhen is very kind and experienced. She explain all the treatment plans well in simple English and Chinese for me. Her nurse who assisted me is very gentle and caring for me like give tissue after treatment when give injection she tap my shoulder n clam do me Dr was very sweet to answer my questions very good clinic with Dr eng yu zhen
